pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Anything that plays sound
  • Processor: 1Ghz and up
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Not required
  • Storage: 540 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: We recommend stereo
